ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.ERP.Comum import ErpEnvironment from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Suprimentos import CPOrdemCompraItemAnexo from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Handle
handleOCAtual = ErpEnvironment.ObterSessionVar("HANDLE_OC_ATUAL_WEB") if handleOCAtual != None: permissaoCrud = CPOrdemCompraItemAnexo.PermiteCrudAnexos(Handle(handleOCAtual)) widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = permissaoCrud widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = permissaoCrud widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = permissaoCrud
